latte: Creamy double-shot espresso with steamed milk and a touch of microfoam.
espresso: Rich, concentrated single-origin espresso pulled to perfection.
cappuccino: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and airy foam—classic balance.
iced-coffee: Slow-chilled brewed coffee poured over ice, crisp and refreshing.
americano: Espresso topped with hot water for a smooth, long cup.
mocha: Chocolate-kissed latte with whipped cream on request.
cold-brew: 20-hour cold steep for smooth, low-acidity coffee.
green-tea: Light, grassy, and antioxidant-rich whole-leaf infusion.
black-tea: Robust, malty cup—excellent with a splash of milk.
chai-latte: Masala spices simmered with tea and milk; gently sweet.
masala-chai: Bold Indian spiced tea brewed strong with milk.
iced-tea: House-brewed tea served chilled; sweetened or unsweetened.
croissant: Buttery, flaky layers baked fresh every morning.
scone: Crumbly and rich; ask for jam and butter.
danish-pastry: Laminated dough with rotating fruit or cream-cheese fillings.
banana-bread: Moist loaf with ripe bananas; toasted on request.
chocolate-eclair: Choux pastry filled with vanilla custard, topped with chocolate.
avocado-toast: Sourdough, smashed avocado, lemon, seeds, and chili flakes.
breakfast-sandwich: Egg, cheddar, and choice of bacon or mushrooms on brioche.
yogurt-parfait: Greek yogurt, seasonal fruit, and crunchy granola layers.
oatmeal: Hearty oats with honey; add-ons: nuts, seeds, berries.
pumpkin-spice-latte: Autumn spices with pumpkin purée and velvety milk.
peppermint-mocha: Chocolate and peppermint with espresso and milk—holiday favorite.
gingerbread-cookie: Spiced cookie with molasses and a soft bite.
eggnog-latte: Holiday classic—espresso with creamy eggnog and nutmeg.
